_translationInfo.instructions: Only translate text in 'value' fields. Do not modify any other fields.

noValue.value: You need to provide a key

explanation.value: Allow book owners to include the following downloads when publishing online:

info.value: Allow inserting custom HTML as header and footer for published books:

explanation.value: Disabled languages will not show in the language switcher.
See the Contributor's Guide to contribute translations for the standardised version. If you turn off the standardised version, you can upload customised translation strings.
The name of the language that will appear in the language selection dropdown.
The code to display the country flag in the language dropdown. See <ref>this list</ref> for reference.

downloadStrings.value: Download translation strings for this language

explanation.value: Provide the terms and conditions that users must agree to on sign up.

value: I'm here to help with your book's design.
You can also ask questions about the current design.
For example: What is the page size of the book?
Here are some suggestions to get started:
Change the page size to 5 x 8 inches
Change the title font to sans serif

prompt.value: Type your book design instruction or question here ...

noValue.value: Please, tell me what you want to do.

message.value: Just give me a few seconds.
There was an error generating the response. Please try again in a few seconds.
Please provide more details or clarify your request so I can assist you with the book's design.

empty_book.value: Make your first prompt related to the Book

empty.value: Make your first prompt related to this

invalidEmail.value: This is not a valid email address

tooShort.value: Password should not be shorter than 8 characters

noMatch.value: The two passwords that you entered do not match

info.value: The book owner has full access. Collaborators with edit access can edit content and create publishing profiles. Collaborators with view access can view content and publishing profiles.

emailInput.value: Enter email addresses, separated by commas

detail.value: Users with edit access to this book can use the AI Book Designer.

noValue.value: Please input a custom block tag
Please input a custom inline tag

detail.value: Users with edit access to this book can use AI writing prompts.
Users with edit access to this book can create and query a knowledge base. Requires AI writing prompts and free-text prompts to be on.
Users with edit access to this book can alter the tools supported by the editor.

noPermission.value: You don't have permission to access this book. Select 'OK' to be redirected to your Dashboard.

editingConflict.value: You can't delete a chapter that is currently being edited by another collaborator.

generalPermission.value: You don't have permissions to perform this action. Please contact the book owner.

message.value: A change of your permissions just occurred. Your new permissions will be updated in the background.

general.value: Something went wrong. You will be redirected back to your dashboard. Please contact your Administrator.

bookRequest.value: There is something wrong with the book you have requested. You will be redirected back to your Dashboard.

bookDeleted.value: This book has been deleted by the owner. Select 'OK' to be redirected to your Dashboard.

limit.value: It looks like you've made too many requests in a short period. We have usage limits to ensure service reliability. Please wait for a few minutes before trying again. If you're repeatedly getting this message, please contact your admin.

aiKey.value: Access key is missing or invalid

externalImages.value: Pasting external images is not supported. Please upload an image file by selecting the image icon in the toolbar.

empty.value: You don’t have any books yet

uploadZone.value: Drag and drop your documents here

signup.value: Do you want to sign up instead?

description.value: Start your first document with a blank slate using the built-in Editor
Don't overthink it, you can change your title at any time.

details.value: Each file you upload will be a separate chapter in your book. You can reorder chapters and import more chapters later.

description.value: Please enter the email address connected to your account.

details.value: An email has been sent to <1>{{userEmail}}</1> containing further instructions.

error.value: Something went wrong while trying to save this profile.
Something went wrong while trying to delete this profile.

content_1.value: Your book will be published at a unique URL. You can update and republish it any time.

content_2.value: Publishing may take a few minutes. Once complete, the book will open in a new browser tab.

missingPDF.value: You need to select a PDF profile if you want to include a PDF in your website.

missingEPUB.value: You need to select an EPUB profile if you want to include an EPUB in your website.

warning.value: Careful: Publishing again will overwrite the previously published book.

title.value: There Is No Preview for EPUBs.

detail.value: Please download your EPUB and preview it in your reader of choice.

description.value: Include the following downloads in your website:

selectProfile.value: Choose the PDF profile you want to include:

noProfileAvailable.value: You don't have any saved PDF profiles. First create one on the New Preview tab.

selectProfile.value: Choose the EPUB profile you want to include:

noProfileAvailable.value: You don't have any saved EPUB profile. First create one on the New Preview tab.

placeholder.value: HTML that will appear on top of the web page
HTML that will appear on bottom of the web page

401.value: Error 401: There was a problem authenticating with the Flax microservice. Please contact your administrator.

500.value: Error 500: There was an error generating your preview. Please contact your administrator.

501.value: Error 501: We're having trouble connecting to the preview service. Please check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.

502.value: Error 502: Our preview service is currently down for maintenance. Please check back later or contact your administrator if the issue persists.

504.value: Error 504: The preview is taking longer than expected. Please wait a moment and try again. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.

401.value: Error 401: There was a problem authenticating with the Flax microservice. Please contact your administrator.

500.value: Error 500: There was an error publishing your book. Please contact your administrator.

501.value: Error 501: We couldn't publish your book. Please check your internet connection or try again later. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.

502.value: Error 502: Something went wrong on our end while publishing your book. Please try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.

504.value: Error 504: The publishing process is taking longer than usual. Please give it another try in a moment. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.

introduction.value: This information will be used for optional front matter pages. View these pages in the book's preview.

placeholder.value: Optional - Provide additional description that will appear on the top of the Copyright page
Optional - Provide additional description that will appear on the bottom of the Copyright page

detail.value: All Rights Reserved licensing. Your work cannot be distributed, remixed, or otherwise used without your express consent.

details.value: You waive any copyright and release of your work to the public domain. Use only if you are the copyright holder or have permission from the copyright holder to release the work.
No rights are reserved and the work is freely available for anyone to use, distribute, and alter in any way.

terms.value: I agree to the terms and conditions

emailExists.value: A user with this email already exists.

generic.value: An error occurred. Please try again or contact the administrator.

login.value: Do you want to log in instead?

info0.value: Your template needs to live in git repository. It must have:

info1.value: a <0>template.json</0> file in the root that describes the template files

info2.value: a <0>dist</0> folder, contaning a <0>css</0> folder for the stylesheets, a <0>fonts</0> folder for the fonts and a thumbnail image.

placeholder.value: Git URL of your template's repository

invalid.value: The git url you provided is invalid

body.value: Are you sure you want to disable the <0>{{templateName}}</0> template? The template will not be available for users in the Preview & Publish page.
Are you sure you want to delete the <0>{{templateName}}</0> template?

cloning.value: There was a problem cloning the repository from the url you provided.

emptyFiles.value: Your template contains files that are empty.

missingStylesheet.value: A stylesheet referenced in template.json does not exist. Please make sure you are referencing the correct files.

missingThumbnail.value: The thumbnail file referenced in template.json does not exist. Please fix the reference and try again.
